vote.title: Authorize a Chapter 380 economic development grant and loan agreement with P3 Holdings, LLC and/or its affiliates in an amount not to exceed $700,000.00 in consideration of Royal Blue Grocery operations and expansion of locations in Dallas, in accordance with the City’s Public/Private Partnership Program - Not to exceed $700,000.00 - Financing: 2017 Bond Funds (Proposition I) ($350,000.00) and Public/Private Partnership Fund ($350,000.00) (This item was deferred on December 11, 2019)
